name: A1 - Engine Repair
description: Diagnose and repair gasoline engine mechanical and performance issues in passenger vehicles and light trucks.

name: A7 - Heating & Air Conditioning

name: A8 - Engine Performance
description: Diagnose and repair engine performance issues, emissions, and drivability in passenger vehicles and light trucks.

name: A9 - Light Vehicle Diesel Engines
